comprehensive_overview: The Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) is a software infrastructure for building and coupling weather, climate, and related Earth science models. It provides a flexible and reusable software architecture that facilitates the use, development, and coupling of Earth science models.
core_features: Supports modeling weather, climate, and Earth science phenomena
Provides infrastructure for building and coupling models
Facilitates interoperability and data exchange between models
Offers tools for parallel computing and performance optimization
